text: Great experience. Sharon is one of the nicest people I have met. She was very professional as well as friendly and instantly made me feel comfortable. I absolutely love, love, love the way my tan looks. It is exactly what I wanted to look like.  I will not be going anywhere else but to Ms. Sharon. Thank you for the wonderful experience and most definitely thank you for my gorgeous tan!

Sharon was wonderful and really helped me understand what and why she did what she did! I think I might not be able to stop getting this service!

text: Sharon does wonderful work! I was getting prepped for a Caribbean cruise, and she gave me a lovely sun kissed glow! I was super nervous and self conscious going in, but Sharon made me feel relaxed and comfortable.

text: First time getting an airbrush tan and mine looks amazing Sharon was so wonderful made me feel comfortable explained everything in details. I’ve been to the tanning salon both spray on tans before that makes you look orange and will never go back, after getting my airbrush tan done by Sharon this is the only place I’ll go my tan is a beautiful brown I feel so sexy and beautiful

text: I have been using self tanners for years and this is the best spray tan I have ever had. The color is beautiful. The lady was amazing very caring. name: Leigh Cella
text: I cannot say enough about my experience. I was so comfortable for my first airbrush tan; and this was coming in so nervous. Even after going back to work right afterwards I received compliments on how great I looked. Sharon not only gave me a great, natural looking tan-she even gave me education on my skin and how to keep my tan longer. You can tell she is not in this business for just the money; she truly loves what she does and has an art!! Go see her at Envy Salon ASAP!

name: Leigh Cooper
text: Had a wonderful experience, Sharon let me watch while she airbrushed my daughter for prom. Sharon is extremely experienced and knowledgeable in the art of airbrush tanning. My daughter loves her color, can’t wait to make an appointment for myself. Highly recommend!!

name: Amy Hill
text: Sharon is awesome!! She is very professional and informative during my visit today.  I am super excited to see my tan in the morning as it develops overnight.  I am looking forward to my next visit at Envy Salon!! Thank you again, Sharon!

name: Cheryl Michael
text: Awesome! Sharon is wonderful. Her 5 years of experience shows. I was at ease instantly. My tan looks natural and the color is a beautiful golden brown expertly applied.  For the cost of a pedicure, I will choose to do this again! Looking forward to trying the Bodybuilding , darker, tan for my first show in May!

name: Karrie Coons
text: This was a great experience.  I felt safe, comfortable and excited about being at Envy Salon.  Sharon did a great job with my airbrush tan along with explaining before and after instructions.  It's been 3 days later and it looks amazing!  The fact that I'm not orange is awesome!  I'm thankful to have an option to get color without the risk of skin cancer from the sun or tanning bed.  I would strongly recommend visiting Envy Salon if you are interested in getting a safe, even tan.

name: Nicky C
text: Sharon was WONDERFUL.  This was my first experience and after reading all her reviews decided to try her salon.  I can't say enough she was professional, understanding, thorough, and put me right at ease.  She made me feel and look soo sexy I can't say enough. It was just like the other reviews stated for the price of a manicure, quick in and out.  If you are thinking about I would visit Envy Salon you won't regret it. I wasn't orange, gorgeous tan and its been a few days applying her instructions it looks great!!! I am very happy I went & will repeat this again!!!

text: Sharon is the best!! Her tans are wonderful and she is very educated on skin care! She is always there to answer your questions and really does a good job. Highly recommend if you want a high quality spray tan!

text: Great experience at Envy Salon! I wasn't sure what to expect for my first airbrush tan, but Sharon made me feel super comfortable. It was like I had been going there for years! I'm in love with my tan! I'm not going to miss the tanning bed AT ALL!!! Thank you, Sharon! 😊

text: The best place in Huntsville for airbrush tanning. Sharon is just wonderful and does a great job explaining the airbrush process. You'll look like you have a beautiful golden beach tan in a few short minutes! Never orange, lasts awhile and looks flawless. I highly recommend Envy Salon!

text: Sharron is the best!  Don't be afraid of turning orange- it NEVER happens at Envy salon.  Get a safe beautiful glow without skin damage.

text: Envy Salon is the only place to go in Huntsville for a flawless, professionally done spray tan. "Natural" is the best way to describe Sharon's work - you will never look fake or orange.

name: Danielle Hunter
text: Envy salon is the absolute best if looking for a spray tan!! She does an amazing job with beautiful tan that looks so natural! No lines or anything! She makes you comfortable and a great experience I will never go anywhere else!!!

name: Mark Hall
text:
Very Frustrated...My wife and I have payed over $100.00 a month for a membership  for over two years. Due to our busy life styles, we join Palm Beach Tan specifically for the spray feature which typically alloys us to get in and out quickly.  In the last few months we have had terrible experiences with the lack of maintaining  there equipment with this location and the Auburn location.  Many times over I have undressed and stepped into the booth for a spray and with very much disappointment the only spray I`m receiving is air only.   No tanning solution!! Or we come in for a spray and the booth is not working at all. This has happened to my wife and I multiple times recently. Very frustrating to have to get dressed and go make someone aware at the front desk and then go and get undressed for the second time.
My opinion is. ..If the staff would spend more time preparing the machines for there next guest, these issues shouldn`t happen.  These unpleasant experiences are causing my wife and I to rethink whether or not we should  continue with our membership and this may not matter.  This is not good for your loyal paying members

resp.text: Mark, we are so sorry to hear about these disappointing experiences at our salon and would like to connect with you to discuss. We always try to make ourselves available to customers and we want you to know that we are here now. If you're willing to speak with us, please email pbtfeedback@tanningmail.com and include your full name, phone number, and a link to this review. Once received, we'll get in touch with you as soon as possible. Thank you. -Your Friends at Palm Beach Tan

name: Melissa Norris
text: There's not a thing I could complain about. The girls here know me by name and that's a major plus in my book. They are always smiling and that brightens my visit everytime. I'm very impressed with how well they are educated about the products and the beds. Palm Beach on college street is the place to be.. awesome girls and awesome place..well worth the money

resp.text: Hi Melissa! Wow! Thank you so much for this wonderful review! We are thrilled to hear that you're receiving such excellent customer service and that you're enjoying your time with us! We can't wait to see you again soon! -Your Friends at Palm Beach Tan

name: brianna nicholson
text: The staff here was phenomenal. Super friendly, super helpful, always a pleasure to chat with for a second before going into the AWESOME beds. All the levels have newer beds and different styles even in the same levels for a change up and an even tan.  There's so many rooms it could be confusing where to go, but the staff makes sure you know where you're going. Everything is clean!

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to rate our salon, Brianna! We look forward to seeing you in our salon again soon! -Your Friends at Palm Beach Tan

name: Tiffany Perez
text: I first came here last year, but unfortunately was forced to stop coming because my doctor placed me on a medication that made my skin photosensitive. I have been off the medication for 5 months now and wanted to start tanning again. Since I had such a good experience here last year that I decided to go to Palm Beach Tan again. Everything about this location is fantastic! I love the girls that work here! They are very helpful and made me feel welcome! As long as I am in Auburn this will be my place of choice to tan!

resp.text: Hey Tiffany! Thank you so much for this amazing review! We are so glad that you love our salon and that our team is providing you with such helpful customer service! We are thrilled to have you back and we can't wait to see you again soon! -Your Friends at Palm Beach Tan

name: Jose Caballero
text:
Buyer beware. Bought a self application tanning lotion and needed  to return it the same day, unused. The staff refused to take it back saying they just couldn’t know for sure that it had not been used or something put in it. I asked where was the disclaimer in the store (there was no disclaimer on the receipt) stating that all sales are final. She said there wasn’t any such disclaimer. I understand if they don’t want to take it back, but absolutely it should be stated visibly at the register or near the merchandise and in the receipt.

Update:
A very kind staff member did contact me and offered their assistance in making the situation right for me. I appreciate their effort to make sure their customers are happy...that says a lot to me about a company!

resp.text: Jose, thank you for bringing this to our attention. We're so sorry to hear that you were disappointed in our salon and we'd like to speak with you to discuss your experience. If you're willing, please email pbtfeedback@tanningmail.com with your full name, phone number and a link to this review. Once received, we'll have someone reach out to you ASAP. Thank you. -Your Friends at Palm Beach Tan

text: I am more than upset over my visit to Palm Beach Tan! The worst experience by far I've ever had tanning. The worst part was when I called to ask if there was anything I could do at home to lessen this outcome.....THE PER koSON WHO ANSWERED THE PHONE HUNG UP ON ME. Hoping it was a accident, I called back. NO ONE ANSWERED after a full minute of ringing. This will be memorable wedding pictures.

text: I was a member for many years and decided to take a break from tanning. My best friend went in and got a great deal for a couple of months. I figure I'll start going again for the price she was paying. After all, it's Spring! WRONG!!! I go in with her to get the same deal and it's more than double the money she was quoted. Of course, that deal had just expired. They just wanted to sign me up for the automatic draft once a month, but it was still more for one month than she paid for 2 months. I seriously won't be back. Sadly, after all those years and numerous products I've bought from them. I wouldn't recommend palm beach tan to anyone😢😢😢

text: I really like this planet fitness.  Its brand new, the equipment is nice and everything is well maintained.  And best of all, the staff is great!

name: Anthony Montgomery
text: This is the first time I visited this location. The staff helped at the front with changing my membership from another location. There seemed to be plenty of space. I didn't have to wait on anyone, which is number one for me at any fitness center. Social distance measures were decent, as can be expected. The only real issue that bothered me was that one employee was talking to a customer waiting to go into the spa while I was trying to leave, and he walked in front of me three times going back and forth from the other customer and the counter, as if he couldn't see me. He didn't speak to me at all. I didn't find it very professional to be cutting customers off repeatedly and not saying excuse me or anything, just expecting me to continue to move and go around after already changing directions without even acknowledging me there. It would've been much better if he had the conversation with the customer at the counter, at the table, said "excuse me," or even "sorry about that," anything really to let me know I was valued as much as the person he was talking to and not just in his way. Things like that irk me, especially as a customer. Other than that though, pretty great first-time experience. If it doesn't get too much busier without being expanded, then I'll plan on this being my main gym. Oh, one more thing, I wish they had the treadmills like Midtown. Only having an up and down and not a keypad is annoying when trying to change interval speeds. The other features were nice too, but not a huge problem.

name: Bri Brown
text: Bailee is awesome! Her customer service is amazing. She is an asset to Planet Fitness for sure!

name: Brian Williams
text:
Edited my review.   Can’t find a mask in my car, they don’t have one I can buy, they do they have any disposable masks on site.   So I’m refused service.  Then to beat it all, hardly anyone in there wears masks, they just walk past the front desk then take off their masks (as I would normally do). Hypocritical feel-goodism.  Good gym overall, just do not like the fact of mandating something but not offering the product mandated.
**and to top it off, I’m currently in the gym staring at a 2 employees with a mask below their nose.  , get you some of that***

New edit:  other than that incident , I love this gym, and with relaxation of masks mandate they have done away with the “hypocritical feel goodism” that had existed.   Great gym.

name: Jenny Biggs
text: I went in to get my PBT monthly tan. I have been a customer for almost 2 years now. They charged me (full price) for my tan, and when I caught it, they just told me that I could have extra tan dollars for the future. I had already told the woman that I was not going to be coming back, not because I didn’t like Palm Beach, but because I’m starting school and it will be a really long time before I ever come back again. I just wanted a refund, because I need every bit of money to buy my textbooks. Now I have about $40 worth of tan dollars, but I don’t even know if I’ll have time to come in and get my tan. I don’t hate Palm Beach, I was just very disappointed this time. I would have been completely fine with a refund, and I still would have paid for the extra add ons in my tan! I just didn’t like having to pay extra money for a service that I don’t even want.

resp.text: Hi Jenny! We're so happy that we were able to resolve this. Please feel free to reach out with any further questions or concerns. Thank you! -Your Friends at Palm Beach Tan

text: I'm a novice at tanning and everyone  Payton, Bree, and Avery  where all very helpful in explaining exactly how and what to do the get an amazing tan.  I signed up for the combo tan and have had great experiences with the tanning beds and the spray tan. Listen to them they know what they are talking about! With their beds and advice you can't go wrong. Thank you Palm Beach Tan. They are extremely clean and very accommodating.

resp.text: Hi Diadra! Thank you so much for this wonderful review! We are thrilled to hear that you're enjoying your experience with us and we hope to see you in our salon again soon! -Your Friends at Palm Beach Tan

text:
GREAT place.. great girl's..up to date beds..clean..affordable.. easy to deal with.. only down side is bad radios in rooms

New review 12/7/18:  It's always a nice part of my day to get to tan. I dislike tho that the employees are constantly changing and that they are pushed to sell the same stuff to everyone.  I dont mind hearing about deals and new products but for them to have to push sales gets tiring.  That goes back to the employees always rotating stores... when they stay, they know the customer and their names. It would be nice if when customers come in that we can type our own names in like we do our pin. I'm not saying that we need to see the computer screen, but to always have to tell a new person our last name every day just is impersonal and tired.

resp.text: Hi Candace! Thank you so much for taking the time to review our salon! We're thrilled to hear that our team is taking great care of you, and that you've been enjoying your visits! Can't wait to see you again soon! -Your Friends at Palm Beach Tan

name: Lauren Rose
text: Yesterday (May 17, 2016) late evening (8:52 pm) or there about, and I arrived to tan and was told by the front counter young girl that the entire right side of the building beds were closed. She was on the floor vacuuming and didn't even notice that I was standing at the counter. There was another girl standing at the counter on her phone. I couldn't help but feel her response was because it was close to closing time or because they had already cleaned those and were closing up that side. I just recently moved to the area from Hawaii so keeping a tan is important however, working full time and having children prevents that leisure. So I promptly purchased the platinum package, which for the amount that I paid for it that you would think that I'd be given an explanation as to why I'm unable to use my package level at the facility. I just felt as if I was being rushed and that if there was an electrical issue that it should have been conveyed. Overall, I love The Palm Beach Tan in Daphne. I just felt last night would have made ANY person who spent $100.00 to join not even 3 weeks prior that quite a bit upset. Attention to detail, it's such a little thing but it makes a huge difference.

resp.text:
Hi Lauren -
We are so so sorry to hear that you were disappointed by your recent customer service experience with us at our salon, and we thank you so much for reaching out to us about this issue. If you're willing to speak with us, please send us an email to pbtfeedback@tanningmail.com and include your full name, phone number and a link to this review. When I told the girls after that it was broken, they informed me that "oh yea they forgot to tell me that part, and that it was either no fan or let the bed fry itself. text: I could give zero stars I would.  The owner (not sure of her name but she's very short and obese.) Rude. Nasty attitude. Great beds, very convenient for me in terms of location, but I will not be back because of her.  Sad, since she's the owner. Maybe she'll get her act together?

resp.text:
"Laura" :)

Some how we have absolutely no record of you in our system, had you actually tanned here you would know that we do require picture ID info (legal name, address, phone number, and birth date) and then you are required to sign a release form. By any chance you can provide a receipt... or even tell us a date I will check our camera footage and MORE than graciously give you a full refund and a free bottle of tanning lotion :)

But we both know nothing will come from that :) For someone who demands so much respect this really isn't the way to go about getting such. Jealous ex's really are something else. Oh, and leaving fake reviews then asking for us to bring your son to your mother's house because you don't have a car nor a ride really doesn't go hand in hand... get your act together and we will gladly help you out during this long period of time you are struggling. Jealousy, immaturity, and ugly hearts just aren't going to get you far, sister... but you are in our prayers!

name: James Joyce
text: Exactly what the sign says. Workout Anytime isn't as big or well-stocked as Tiger Iron Gym, but it is cheaper and generally has everything a no-nonsense lifter could want. The $39 "rate guarantee fee" is a bit sleazy and truly nothing more than a delayed signup fee, they're short a couple 20kg barbells (there's a couple random 15kg ones that float around between racks), and the barcode scanner out front is a little janky, but everything works, you get 24-hour access, and the membership being good at other locations is cool. Another set of dumbbells might be good. This is *not* Planet Fitness in every way that matters, and that's a damn good thing.

name: Brittany
text: Love this place & the people who run it!! The Current hours are Monday- Friday-9AM-7PM/ Saturday-9:30AM-4PM & Closed Sunday.Very friendly & fast service & clean beds with extra towels in the rooms. Best prices on tan lotions in Decatur & they give you free tan stickers, & have face wipes available. Only $5.50 for a single visit, & less than $40 a month for unlimited tans in any bed. They have regular tanning beds,the bronzing beds, & a stand up tanning booth. I havent had a spray tan done here yet but that service is also available. I go here because you can do a single visit, pay by minutes or monthly and it can be paid with cash or card, unlike other places in the area that only take credit cards & you have to sign up to have it taken out monthly. I will keep choosing this place to tan!

name: Julie Dickey
text:
Normally I'd give them 5⭐. But when I arrived there wasn't any other customers, the girl who helped me was very kind. The problem came when I found out the Versa was broken AGAIN & they have to come from ATLANTA to fix the only one shop has... it was too late to drive over to the Vaughn rd shop to use there's... but I tried there's last time and the versa is SO old! It's freezing in room, machine has what looks like an old heater that turns orange red when it's on to dry you. The heater doesn't go up & down & is a safety risk of burning someone if they slipped. It has NO feet markings so you best get it right & not go by the dalraida versa... cause it doesn't have all the cycles. You'll not be sprayed evenly if you don't know how it works. Did I say the room is Freezing? Swap rooms with a heated bed. ALSO after I got prepped using expensive single pk of primer, paid for additives (I'm a top level member &
you'd think since the versa is free ($100/month isn't free) I'd get the few dollars off since there equipment is broken. Well I'm prepped & the bed never comes on.
I cover up walk all the way from back to very front all glass windows to tell the girl. Come to find out the computer has shut down. I was there at 9:10. So it all was a waste. She apologized & I wasn't mad at her... but I'm paying for the past few years this $$ Auto draft and this is how it goes. I'll be cancelling before next bank draft. Cheaper to pay as I go for spray tan especially when I have to pay $15 more to use a bed I don't want to really use cause of the color it gives you.

resp.text: Hi Julie- We are very sorry to hear this and we'd like to speak with you. If you don't mind, please email pbtfeedback@tanningmail.com and include your phone number and a link to this review. We will get in touch with you ASAP. Thank you. -Your Friends at Palm Beach Tan

name: Mallory Druash
text:
I have been actively employed as the manager at SunCatchers since we opened almost 4 years ago. Manuela has strived to create an environment which provides a positive and welcoming atmosphere for every guest every time. We value our clients and live by the motto “experience the difference.”  We offer countless of services such as: tanning, teeth whiting, eyelash extensions, and fit body wrap sessions. While you’re waiting, we have a awesome selection of boutique clothing ranging from sizes Small-3XL.
We also offer salon quality lotions which are professional, in-date,  and affordable! (Lotions starting at just $25!) We honor our military and first responders with 10% off any purchase. We also offer EVERYONE 10% off on Wednesday for WCW. We value each and everyone of our clients and would LOVE to have you guys tanning with us! ❤️

resp.text: 👆🏼what she said 😘

name: Misty Washington
text: Love this place! Staff is great and knowledgeable, and the tanning prices are very affordable. Always look forward to visiting!

name: Ashey Bannon
text: I went in to purchase some tanning lotion for the tanning bed and one of the workers tried to up sale me into this tanning lotion called “Sea for yourself transfer resistant white bronzer” for $50, now mind you I don’t care about the cost but because I am a beginner tanner she picked out the most expensive one for my skin. I went home and looked it up and it literally cost $9.99 on Amazon for the exact same product so I was completely and utterly shocked I will never return to Sun Catchers again extremely dissatisfied and do not recommend!

resp.text: Hello Mrs. Bannon, I am very sorry you are dissatisfied with the pricing of one of our lotions that in fact is on sale for ONLY $28 right now. The suggested Retail Price for this particular Tanning Lotion, Sea for Yourself is $45. This lotion is on the lower end of a price point, so by far not our most expensive tanning lotion! It is a transfer resistant white bronzer that is an adequate stater lotion for a new tanner. You may not know this but many tanning lotions you find on the internet at a price point that is much lower than we, as a professional tanning salon, can purchase it from our distributors are expired, discontinued or come from china. I apologize that we where unable to make you happy with your lotion purchase and that your felt the need to leave us a 1* review. The lotion you looked up on Amazon takes 3-6 weeks to arrive, that means it is in fact coming from china. Perhaps the tanning salon you are currently tanning at can price-match with Amazon. Kindest Regards!

I have asked on 4 different visits to try another bed or even downgrade to the beds where you lay for 20 minutes.  I was trying to get a base tan for a vacation where I will be in the sun ALL day for 7 days.  I am going to have to coat myself in sunblock for this one.

If the stairs are a problem, you could always park in the back and come up the ramp. In further circumstances, please place any comments or complaints with management so we can make sure your experience at the actual Tan Sublime is one you'll give five stars!

name: Manda Bacon
text:
This place is nice and relaxing. The staff are super friendly! I only took a star off because I told them I've had trouble in the past with sunless tanning - that it comes out blotchy especially on my torso. They advised me to exfoliate before my appointment (which I did), wear loose clothing (which I did), and to not shower for a certain amount of time (a direction I also followed). They suggested which sunless tanning option that wouldn't turn out blotchy. However, after all that, the color torso still turned out as it did in the past. The weather was chilly, so it wasn't an issue during my family's vacation; but I still would have liked for the staff's confidence in the sunless tanning product to have been true. The picture is of my brother and me in Epcot 2-3 days after my appointment. You can see the color difference there.
TL;DR: Relaxing environment, friendly staff, sunless tan not fully realized.

name: Anna N.
text:
21 reviews
5.0 star rating 5/25/2017
I've never had a spray tan before. However, as I drove across the south with the top down in my little convertible to go to my niece's graduation, I looked in the mirror and realized that half my face and the upper left part of my arm were a little more burned than the rest of me. I hadn't seen my family in 7 years and couldn't show up half-burned, could I? Most definitely not! So I came screeching to a halt in front of Hollywood Tans shortly after they opened, praying they could figure out something that would at least even me out.

Sara, the owner, was amazing! She quickly assessed my funky skin tone and squeezed me in for a custom airbrush. I left looking bronzed and EVEN. She was sweet and non-judgmental as I stripped to my underpants and showed off my pasty/burned fattitude. She took her time and I never felt rushed even though I knew that she had an appointment coming in soon. She explained exactly what I needed to do and not do going forward to keep my tan and make certain it developed the way it needed to.

If you live in the area (or are just driving through... it's right off the highway), make sure to give them a try. If I weren't still beautifully tan on my way back, I would have stopped in for a touch up.

name: Tammy Contorno
text: Great selection of beds.  Choice between Level 1 (only 5-6 days= base tan) to Level (3-4 day =base tan).  Custom Spray Tans are the best in town!

name: Robbin Collins-Lint
text: My favorite time of the day is when I'm relaxing in the tanning bed. This is the best place in town. Nice state of the art beds that always have new bulbs, I tan so quick and it's such a beautiful deep color. Everyone is very friendly and always smiling. They have the best tanning products and the new boutique has the cutest one of a kind styles.

name: Christine Cole
text: Best place in town! The owner, Sarah, is amazing; very friendly, knowledgeable & helpful. The spray tan (done by Libby) was amazing & 2 days after my spray I accidentally messed up a place on my face. Sarah told me to come back & she fixed me up at no additional cost. They have a large selection of beds & alternative tanning methods. It's super clean & just a fun, great place to go. I highly recommend Hollywood Tans to anyone looking for an excellent place to get bronzed & beautiful!

name: Emma Lee Gullatt
text:
Great place if you want to tan while off at college and continue to tan at your location at home, but this is place is a trap! After I have cancelled my membership TWICE and I have continued to be charged for the past three months. When I went in each time to cancel my membership I was given a receipt showing my cancellation and always the first of the month I get another charge! I have gone in to the store three times to verify that it will not charge my account again and each time they confirm I have cancelled, yet when I am charged and go in they cannot pull any history of me cancelling my account from their system! TRULY AMAZING, 0 HELP. Needless to say I now am disputing the charges on my card, and having to get a new card. But anyways, if you like a good trap into getting charged out of your money, no costumer help, and crappy systems to get out of, THIS IS THE PLACE FOR YOU!!!!
ROLL TIDE AND GET YOUR SELF TO TANNING OASIS!!!:)

They offered to re-spray me the next day but I was leaving for my trip and would not be able to return so it was too late to get another one. Besides who knows what another layer would have look liked.

I want to point out the sales ladies were nice. I had absolutely no issues with them.  It was the tan itself that was so bad.  By the third day my legs had small red streaks that resembled red hairs. Not happy at all with product. Quite embarrassing.

name: Cat Honeycutt
text:
I got a same-day appointment in from out of town. The facility seemed like there was a lot of DIY work for upkeep - thick paint on cabinet doors so you could see the brush strokes, tiles with messy grout that looked dirty (and probably would no matter how you scrubbed), several different flooring styles as you walked through, visible command hooks used for hanging pictures. Finer finishes that made the salon look like it needed attention.

The haircut however was great. We had a consult where my stylist Tammy asked about my preferences, lifestyle, and schedule to make sure she could suggest appropriate styles that would look good at home. She was careful and thorough, and friendly but not overly talkative.

I will say, the services tab on google is not accurate for pricing, as a cut and style was more than listed on here. Still, it was a good service and I am satisfied with my results.

name: Mo Du
text:
Be ready for a lengthy review:
I was looking for a nail salon to become my regular spot.  Unfortunately, Olivia A. Salon is not the place for me.  I went in for an acrylic fill with gel on top and while everyone was friendly  I left unhappy with my nails.   The result was chunky, overly thick, and uneven.  It looked worse than press on nails glued and painted by a child.  The nail technician did NOT use a drimmel or motorized file but used a foam hand file to take off my existing and layer of acrylic.
At first this seemed nice but I was mistaken.  She was unable to file the smaller sectional of my nail bed and ended up filing skin which hurt.  My nails were embarrassing to look at as they appeared malformed and lumpy.  When she applied the gel she used 3 very thick coats of color that didn't dry under the light and were soft to the touch.  To be fair, I'm picky with my nails and when I saw the manicure going south I didn't say anything.  I should have.  Instead I left and went straight to another nail salon.  At the next salon they showed my Quasi-Modo nails around and laughed.
The salon itself is easy enough to find but the level of aesthetics is less than what I like.  They clearly want to be a high end salon but the quality is not quite there.  In addition, the prices were NOT worth it!  They charged $10 over what any other salon does.  The people were nice and they fit me in.  And I want to make it clear, I did not say anything to the lady.  But I'm not sure that she would have been able to fix them even if I had.

text: It looks cute on the outside and even in the front reception area but the rest of the place isn't well kept. I was receiving highlights and the cape the hairdresser put on me was filthy. I kept getting someone's cut hair on me and she hadn't started my hair yet. She was professional and very nice though. I only did a partial highlight and a trim which looked good blown out in her mirror. Then I got to my car and noticed that part of my eyebrow was bleached! She didn't use foils but some kind of paper and apparently when it was sitting on the front of my face it bleached through. Then the shampoo bowl had someone else's hair color left on the neck part of the bowl. Now that I have my hair pulled back I have parts that look like cheetah spots. I spent $150 for this! I will not go back or recommend this place to anyone.

name: Kenneth Baity
text:
The staff is great, friendly and customer oriented.  The manager knows her customers by name and has a positive relationship with them.

The tanning salon itself is average.  The beds for the most part are dated on the mid level range and the fact that the radio is not piped into the bed itself is unsatisfactory.  Music is a big draw to help me relax and further enjoy the process.

I am a recent transplant from 360 Tan who sold out to Palm Beach recently and I like the point system and upgrades on weekdays better than the system used at PB.

For the most part this tanning salon is great on customer service which keeps the customers coming back but truly could be upgraded on equipment which is easy fix.

resp.text: Hi Kenneth! Thank you so much for taking the time to give us your feedback and this great review! We are so happy to hear that you are receiving such excellent customer service at our salon! We are also so sorry to hear that you are disappointed with our salon's equipment and we thank you so much for bringing this issue to our attention. We would love to get in touch with you to talk this through! If you are willing to speak with us, please send us an email with your full name, phone number, and a link to this review to pbtfeedback@tanningmail.com and a member of our customer service team will contact you ASAP! We look forward to hearing from you!  -Your Friends at Palm Beach Tan

name: Deb in Alabama
text:
UPDATE (1/6/18): As always, Customer Service is top notch at the Madison location.  On this particular visit, Ms. Katie went above & beyond in my opinion.  Though they were about to close, she still allowed me to tan. I did appreciate that greatly.

Admittedly, there are some "minor" things I would like to see changed (i.e., women's bathroom fixed, as it's been about 1 month since it's been "out-of-order"; some of the beds have cracks in them, which is a bit concerning; would be nice if they had at least 2 stand-up beds instead of 1; and it would be nice to be informed that bulbs have been changed out on a bed when you haven't tanned in awhile).

Otherwise, I like that they have plenty of beds without any wait time.  They keep decent hours for tanning.  The gals are always friendly when I come in.

They also offer fun "incentives" for upgrades and/or freebies, which is nice.  It's truly the only tanning place where I've had "fun" tanning.  I've been tanning for more than 25+ years and in multiple countries, so I can say this honestly!

Blessings to each!

UPDATE (7/30/17): As always, Customer Service is top notch at this location.  I also like the fact that this company makes tanning "fun" by offering sweepstakes, upgrades & every now & then freebies (be nice to see more of these considering cost of tanning)!  Also, like the fact that this facility is always clean ...big factor!  Would be nice to see a full-length mirror in either tanning room and/or bathrooms for dressing purposes.  That would be my only recommendation at this point.  Thanks for listening! :-)  HAPPY TANNING! 8-)

UPDATE (1/12/17): I forgot to get the gals name last night, but she was very helpful.  I also like that PBT has these "free" upgrades for members.  I'm really sad to hear the prices are going up, since there are no "competitors' to even compare with.  So I do feel that's a little "unfair" on corporate's part, as I feel the prices are already rather pricey.  I'm on SSDI & can't afford ANYTHING above what I'm already struggling to pay.  Otherwise, I like the customer service, the fact that PBT does periodic contests and/or giveaways, as well as special priced upgrades.  I think for regular paying monthly customers, we should get at least 2 free upgrades a month, but that's my suggestion!  Who knows, in doing that, you may generate more people to upgrade that can actually afford to do so.  For those of us who can't, it's still nice to get that chance to experience what we can't otherwise afford.

(FALL-2016) So far all the gals I've dealt with are very friendly, take time to answer ALL my questions without being "annoyed" by them or making me feel "rushed".  So I appreciate that!  I've been tanning longer than most of them have probably lived life, LOL, but with all the new technology that tanning beds offer now ...I'm still learning new things.  So thank you for taking the time to both listen & respond (respectively)!

Have a blessed day, week, month & year! O:-)

text: I went there to do the free 14 day trial to see how I liked it. Well first of all the guy that was there took forever because he was new. That's okay but why have the new guy by himself? Unfortunately if you do these trials, I was told I can only come during operating hours and also only 3 times during the 7 days and only 7 times during the 14 days after I had to go online and fill in the information myself. I wanted to go to this place because of the overnight hours and if i can't go then, then what's the point? The associate wasn't really the problem, it's the company and their policy that makes no sense.

text: The gym was good got my membership in December and signed the 12 month contract  but unfortunately I had to move in May I still paid for the 12 months but continue receiving invoices after the 12 months but just recently I had a family member die which has put my family in hard times so I called the offices to discuss why I was still being charged and they told me that I had signed the contract in April which is false so I tried to talk with them and they wouldn’t help told me I had to pay 100$ Even though my contract should have expired and email there manager so I did and I still haven’t received a reply so if your decide to workout here don’t sign anything they will scam you!!

name: Kenneth Fagan
text: Anytime Fitness in Jacksonville, Alabama is a sorry business. Recently, I cancelled my contract with them. My cancellation date was through 11 June 2019. On 2 June, I went to get in to workout and I couldn't get in. Today (7 June), I called them about coming in to workout and the representative said I can only workout when the staff is there. I said what? I am supposed to be able to workout anytime until at least 11 June. So, they don't stand behind their advertisement of workout anytime. That is false advertisement. They do not care about their customers. They are only there for the almighty dollar. This is a horrible business. Do yourself a favor and don't use them. They will take your money and provide sorry service. This was a terrible experience.

I couldnt finish my workout due to this.. they have camera's and see this.. like I said, their just worried about their money..i would suggest going to a different gym..

Which was fine because I understood so I went a few more times before I actually moved && it was never cancelled they currently owe me $120 in fees because they keep charging to my debit card that I only use for emergencies so it keeps going in the negatives and have yet to return my calls. "The money will be returned it 5-7 business days" and it's been 3 weeks and I still have nothing. So everyone pay close attention when you cancel your membership here. The manager Patrick is absolutely NO help. & I'm calling their corporate tomorrow.

name: P Sayasane
text:
I’ve attempted to schedule a four serenity package given to my daughters and I for Christmas. When I called to schedule earlier this year, I was told I would get a call back once they’ve contacted another masseuse to come in that they would need two and they would contact me back. I informed them if they was unable to schedule the four, I would like to schedule at least two. I never received a call back. I contacted them once again to schedule the four packages by leaving a message on the website and by phone on several different occasion. Once I received a response, I was informed they would have someone call me back and nothing. Left a message on the website and phone once again, Response…they didn’t have a masseuse in but once the masseuse returned or another one staffed I would be priority and we would be scheduled. I gave it 2 weeks and nothing. Left a message on the website again and by phone. Response, they would have to call me back when the new owners or previous owner was in.😱😳
With the COVID and lack of staff the owner (which will now be the previous) was kind enough to honor the now expired packages but to this day still haven’t been able to schedule an appointment.

I informed the person that gave us these gift certificates and it’s a disappointment thinking you’ve selected the best and get this type of response, unable to receive the services paid for.

Lesson learned: Gift certificates is NOT a good choice!

name: Tera Shade
text: In response to the "1 star" review written 3 years ago.  I responded 2 days after it posted but it never showed up, so I'll try again with my response...When this review was first posted the person included her name (it has since been changed to "anonymous").  I called the reviewer and inquired about her time spent at Bliss.  You see, I am the owner and very concerned about our reputation and our guests experience.  I believe the following information will help you decided if you want to take this reviewer seriously.   Let me begin by saying this reviewer called late in the day to make an appointment to have her hair cut.  Even though we were booked until closing time, one of my stylist agreed to stay late and take the appointment.  The two employees behind the desk greeted this reviewer, offered her something to drink, and informed the stylist of her arrival.  Because it was now after closing time, the two front desk employees left for the day.  This reviewer was not left alone or ignored at any time.  The stylist who volunteered to stay late, finished with the client she was with and was on time for this reviewers scheduled appointment.  This reviewer had her hair shampooed, had more of a trim than a cut, and blown out.  She was charged $15.  Her comment about being charged three times what she should have been charged... Well, I don't know where a woman can get her hair shampooed, cut/trimmed, and blown out for $5.  She did say she was new to the area, so maybe she could get the above service done for $5 where ever she moved from...Just to be clear, Bliss does not offer shampoos, haircuts, and styles for $5....  I noticed she did not mention the amount she was charged.   Could it have been she as embarrassed to admit that she thought $15 was "three times more than what it should have been." Because this reviewer posted this review under her name and because we had her phone number on file, I called and inquired about her time at Bliss.  I stated I was the owner and was making follow up calls with our new clients.  I did not  mention I had read her review but instead asked how she enjoyed her visit with us.  I gave her every opportunity to relate any unpleasant experience she might have had.  I was told that Bliss is a beautiful place and was thanked for taking her appointment on such short notice and after hours.  When asked how she like her hair cut even thought it really was only a trim, she responded "I like it, she did a good job." During our conversation, she never said anything negative about her visit at Bliss, and when I invited her to return in the future she said she would.  To be honest, she has not returned .  I wish she had given us another chance so that she could experience what Bliss is really about.  I would also like to respond to the comment about the service being done half-hearted and with no conversation.  The stylist's mother had just passed away very unexpectedly two weeks earlier.  She was still mourning her loss but trying to live as normal as possible and continue to work and support herself.  While this reviewer had no clue what was happening in our stylist personal life, I think because of the comment she made in her review for all to read, its important for you to know why our stylist was not her usual outgoing friendly self.   I am very interested in making each client feel welcome and appreciated.  I personally follow up with as many clients as possible to make sure that their time at Bliss was relaxing and that they are satisfied with their service.  I know this has been a lot to read, but I wanted to give a little more information about the above review.  I am sure I am not the only business owner that is willing to go above and beyond what is normal to make their guest happy.  If something is not what you are expecting, please let us know.  Give us the opportunity to "fix" it.  Our guest are the reason we even have a business and we understand that, without "you" we wouldn't be here.  We look forward to seeing you and making you feel "special" like the person you are!!!

text: I only give 3 stars because of Indya who performed my teeth-whitening.  She was very kind, professional, and personable.  She was put in a bad position because it seemed like she was over-booked.  I arrived early for a 2 p.m. appointment and was brought back to the room over 30 mins later.  The waiting area is a strange experience:  no receptionist; just a couple of soft-spoken men who hand out water.  I would return to see Indya for another non-teeth treatment but wouldn't recommend this spa to anyone.

resp.text: Hi Elizabeth, I am the owner of Bliss Salon & Day Spa.  I read all reviews on my company and need to reply to this one.  You have my company mixed up with some other company.  Bliss does not perform teeth-whitening services, nor do I employee anyone named Indya.  We have never had any men work at Bliss or any men that hand out water. I do not know what spa you went to but it was not Bliss Salon & Day Spa on Old Shell Road in Mobile, AL.  I try very hard to make Bliss a great experience for every client and would appreciate your correcting the review so that it does not affect my company.  Thank you very much.  Tera

resp.text:
Thanks for the review.  It was nice to meet you and hope to see you again.
Tera

Now this is a GREAT customer!

text: Won't be going back got a massage there and the woman was nice but didn't do any parts I asked her to do walked out still in pain worst 92$ I have ever spent on a massage will never go there again ever was not worth the money spent at all I had to repeatedly ask the woman to go to certain parts I needed worked out and for some reason she kept going back to my left arm I didn't get my WHOLE hour in either she cut me short like 10minuyes for 80$ and paid 12$ in tip was NOT worth the 92$ at all i do NOT recommend this place at all unless you like being ignored.

resp.text: Jessika, I am not able to find you in our system under this name.  Our massage therapist takes her job very serious and always get great reviews.  I don't know how to explain your experience.  There is another company in town called Bliss, I wonder if you may have gotten us mixed up. If you would please call Bliss and ask for me I would love to speak with you so that we can clear this matter up.  We want all of our clients to walk out feeling better than when they came in.  Tera Shade

Tara did an amazing facial, Helen was awesome with the massage and Sarah who did our mani/ pedi is hilarious, we really enjoyed her (side bar she should have her own reality show). The price was very reasonable for such an extensive service. I would definitely recommend Bliss spa to anyone looking for a relaxing experience.

text: This was my second time coming to Sugarmoon, the first visit was great and everyone I encountered was very friendly and professional. Today I didn't feel welcomed at all. The person who checked me in didn't as much as say hello. She asked me my name took me to the room and then told me that they are out of towels because their dryer is broken, what kind of customer service is that? Also, they are offering a 30% discount for nurses but when I asked about getting the discount, I was told that I needed my badge as proof. I told them that I didn't have my badge but I did have my nursing license. I was told that they couldn't accept that because that was not proof that I am a nurse, how dumb is that. Then after getting home, I realized that I had a burn from the wax on one of my eyebrows, I thought I had found a good place to have all of my waxing services done, but I don't think that is the case. I guess I will have to look elsewhere to have them done.

name: Charnika Reynolds
text: I gave this location in Oxford a two because my second experience here was awful, painful, and sticky. My very first wax was done here a few months back by the lady who manages the Gasden location. It was an amazing experience. She made me comfortable, held on to sensitive areas as she pulled the sugar, and braced me when she was about to pull. Today was NOTHING LIKE THAT. Zoey is friendly, with a great personality, but extremely rough, heavy handed, and messy. I should have followed my first mind and drove to Gasden, but I figured it would be the same experience. I was so pleased my first time, I tipped  $25. I am a firm believer in tipping if there is an option to do so, but, I still have hair in between my cheeks, along with clumps of wax,  and a Brazilian is something that can't be rushed. I suggest the Gasden location if you're a first timer. I'll just drive to Birmingham from now on.The staff is great, just read reviews on the person you select or ask questions.

name: Will Wilson
text: It is, by far, the best gym in sylacauga. Every other gym in town thinks they have to charge way too much in order to stay in business. This place proves you don't. They have all the equipment you need and plenty of it for busy times. The staff is courteous, responsive, and seems to genuinely be interested in the physical well being of the members. They just have a good formula for success. Ignore the negative reviews on here. No business is perfect. This one is is too good to lose. Sylacauga needs more places like this.

name: Brad Dennis
text: Great staff that is willing to help and answer questions anytime. Clean and plenty of equipment. Machines for every ability, no excuses for not being able to find something you can do or use here.

name: Charlene Shealey-Heath
text: The gym itself was clean and very spacious. Great, easy to operate treadmills and bikes. My only complaint is I asked the staff to show me how to operate a few machines and give me a tour but was told they would do that when I became a paying customer. I had a 14 day pass trying to see if it was somewhere I would feel comfortable. I didn't get what I expected and haven't been back since. It shouldn't matter if I had a pass or had paid for services; if I needed assistance it should have been offered to me. I hope they don't do all visitors that way

name: Beverly Hughes
text: Nice set up! I opted for a trainer to be sure I wouldn't damage arthritic joints. Upscale system for measuring body and adapting training towards your goals. Good job guys!

name: Noel Hall
text: The staff is amazing but sometimes you definitely feel judgement by the other patrons

resp.text: Noel, thank you for your review. It is always our goal that ALL our members feel welcomed and fully supported at our gym.  While we are not aware of members judging other members, we  would hope  that  what you experienced was most likely distracted, preoccupied members in their own "zone" while working out. This could easily be misunderstood, and more than likely the member has no idea they are interpreted as insensitive.  We will continue to strive for excellence in all areas, and hopefully earn an update in your review! Thanks again!

text:
Its a decent gym. Havent had any issues with management and its always been decently clean. Fix the temperature/humidity problem and it'd be 5 stars.

You cannot however use this gym as they refuse to put in proper AC and insist on using sparsely placed floor fans instead. This just doesn't cut it in a climate where I've seen 80° in december, let alone when it hits 100° in the summer with crazy high humidity year round.

name: Morgan Hardison
text: I was reminded to do this because I had such a rude experience at a place in Dallas, that I felt I needed to explain just how amazing Suns Up Tans was in comparison. I booked my spray tan on a day where it happened to be pouring outside! After I received an amazing spray tan, I was escorted to my car with an umbrella. Then she got in the car with me and blotted any spots that were affected by the rain. She even sent me home with a small container of solution and showed me how to fix any spots that may occur once I got to my location. She went above and beyond customer service, and I was left with a flawless spray tan that never looked orange or spotty. I would recommend this place over and over again!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review! I am so happy that you loved your tan and hope to see you again soon!

name: Jennifer Davis
text: I typically do not write reviews, but my experience here was so bad that I just have to. I am from out of town and am in the area on vacation. I went here on the evening of 12/18 to tan and get some color since it has been cloudy the past few days. My time here was horrible from the minute I walked in the door. The young lady sitting at the desk was so consumed in her phone she had only looked up for a brief second to give a hasty smile. After walking over and explaining I was from out of tan and wanted to only tan once, the young lady handed me a clipboard and a pen. I asked her what this was for and she responded with "fill it out". She was very short and rude with me the entire time I was asking questions about the paperwork, making me feel as if I was an inconvenience to her. Before filling anything out (since I was not sure I even wanted to tan here anymore because of how rude the service and treatment was from this young lady), I asked her about the tanning bed and lotion options, explaining that I would like suggestions and what were the best options, and yet again she was very short and rude. She simply pointed me to where the lotions were, and did not help to explain what any of them were, and as for the tanning beds briefly explained the options very quickly. Because of all of this I decided to leave and to go to another tanning salon in Gulf Shores where I received much better treatment and assistance. Although the place was filled with beautiful clothes and jewelry, the young lady working up front ruined it by having a very ugly attitude. I am disappointed in this business after reading such good reviews on here about the business and their employees. I understand people have bad days and this young lady could have been having one, but to treat a customer with the lack of care she did was ridiculous. I hope that the owner/manager of this place sees this review and does something about this. Not only did this place lose a tanning customer because the poor attitude and customer service of this young lady, but money as well since she made the environment so uncomfortable to be in, let alone shop or tan. This was some of the WORST service I have ever gotten.

resp.text: Jennifer I certainly do apologize that your visit was not a pleasant one. My personal phone number is on the door and I wish that you could have called me.  I looked on the date that you mentioned as well as the "evening" shift to see who the employee was. I asked her about this and she is not aware of anything like this happening.  All of my employees have been trained to provide excellent customer service so I am not sure what could have happened here. You stated that you left and went to Gulf Shores where you received better service. I did call them to ask them to contact you and give my number to so that I could take care of this. However they have not had a Jennifer Davis tan there in 4 years so perhaps you went somewhere else but there is only 1 tanning salon in Gulf Shores.  Please call me at the salon Monday - Friday as I am here these days from 10:00 - 3:00.  I look forward to speaking with you. ~Vickie~

name: Tom Moreau
text: Be careful with the number of sessions that you buy, they expire in 90 days. This caught me by surprise today when my remaining sessions that I bought on November 16, 2015 had "expired" when I went to use them today (3/11/16)! I was not told when I bought them of this expiration period nor are there any signs warning you of such in the store. I have been to other tanning places that expire them after a year, but 90 days is a bit short. This information is just data in a computer. What harm would a longer time out cost?  Nothing.  This is just a money maker for them.

resp.text: Actually we offer the 90 visits as a special with a discounted price instead of purchasing single visits. Most clients who opt for the 5, 10, or 20 visit package only come once a week or every so often and love this option because they save money. Most salons do not offer this at all. The package that you purchased was a 5 visit package and saved you $10.00. The 10 visit package would have saved you $30.00 and the 20 visit package would have saved you $80.00! Quite a deal!  It is posted on the price board that the visit packages are good for 3 months. I am sorry that this package did not work for you however we do offer many other options for your needs. We would love for you to try one of them and see if that better fits your tanning needs. Thanks,  Vickie

name: Nathaniel Vana
text: As a guy who is picky about how my hair is cut, it has been super hard to find someone to do it right. I feel like I tried so many different barber shops and salons hoping to find one that works. Well I found one and that was Capelli Salon. All the ladies at the salon are a great and welcoming. I’ve been going here for a few months now and it is just a great environment all around. I am glad that I found this place. I would recommend this salon to any guy ( or girl ) looking to have their hair done right you will not be disappointed!!!

name: Judy Langford
text: Christina is the best. She is very good as a stylist. She listens, pleases and sweet.

name: Gina Smith
text:
Wonderful place!!
Emma did an awesome job on myself and my family members love her too!

name: Karen Pruitt
text: Love the folks at Capelli!  Always a treat getting my hair styled by Betsy! ❤

name: Regina Gargollo
text: First time visit - I called them in the morning to see if I can get a balayage that day and they said yes. Very easy to set a same day appointment. Emma did a fantastic job! I will be coming back for sure.

name: Lisa Phillips
text: I walked in to the salon on a referral from a friend. The scariest thing it sitting down in a chair and hoping the stylist can "read your mind" and "capture the same vision" you have for your hair. She didn't know me, my personality, or what I liked or didn't like. I was nervous...what if she messed it up? What if I didn't like it? Immediately I was at ease. Everyone was so sweet and the atmosphere was very professional, clean, and calming. Not only did I get a GREAT haircut, I immediately knew I would be back for my color appointment. Another perk--no drama among the stylists! Professional yet friendly! I have even referred a friend there now and she had the same great experience. Best form of advertising is word of mouth! So glad I was referred to Capelli!

name: Amy Gable
text: I overheard a woman talking about getting her hair done here, and she looked great, so I looked it up and booked an appointment. I’ve been back 3 times and absolutely love it! They did a great job! I’ve has Kelly and Kathryn both do my hair.

name: Inmi Brandsema
text: I’ve always had great cuts and service for the past 2 years. The the salon is very flexible and I have always been able to make an same day appointment. I usually see Jerri or Julia. They are great. About a week ago, I saw someone else and I had a terrible experience. Part of it was on me since I did not specify my hair type (long and thick hair) but they also never ask. The stylist seems to be stressed about how long it was going to take to cut my hair. She did not attend to the details and how you can see every layer in my hair if you don’t cut it properly. She ran out of time before her next appointment and sent me to someone else to finish drying my hair. She never came back to check on her work. It was so choppy and uneven. I was so upset about my service. I went to a different salon to get it fixed. Sadly, I will not be returning to Capelli.

name: Bernadette Fraser
text: Very professional & nice personnel, always helpful with good advises, I love the way how beautiful and tidy the rooms are. You will feel very well treated (spoiled) after a visit. 100% recommend

name: Debbie Faris
text: I brought my sister here in July 2016.  I requested a cut/style and highlights and my sister got just a cut and style.  I showed my stylist (Julia) a photo of what I wanted prior to her starting.   When we were finished my hair looked nothing like the cut or highlights I requested.  My sister was very unhappy with her cut also (Katherine did hers).  Both of us had very chopped up cuts which were not the same from one side to the other.  We had negative comments from both friends and strangers who saw our hair later.  Neither of us could style our hair to make it look presentable.  I ended up cutting my own hair and my sisters to clean up the mess.  We were then able to style our hair better and got approval from friends and family.  For me this was the worst professional cut I ever got.

name: Sarah Oswald
text: Best atmosphere in Birmingham. Katherine’s taken me from jet black to blonde without damaging my hair. Absolutely recommend

name: Tanja Rodriguez
text: Have been going there for a while and LOVE Katherine!

name: Paris Wane
text: This place is amazing! April gave me a great cut, listened to everything I was asking for and recommended products for me to try. Great atmosphere, friendly staff. Will definitely be back!

name: Jennifer Summar (NextJen)
text: Great salon with friendly & knowledgeable stylists. Massaging shampoos & reminder calls from the staff are welcome courtesies. Easy to get an appointment, too.

name: Claire F
text: Katherine does an amazing job on my hair color cut and style

name: Brent Panell
text:
Can’t say enough about the services and value offered by the veteran staff of Capelli.

They have a wide variety of talents among the stylists. Schedule an appointment and be prepared to forget other salons.  This is an awesome place!!!

name: Barbara Britton
text: Couldn't have had a better experience very nice people and Kelly was fantastic

name: Whitney Bateman
text: Great salon!  The staff is friendly, professional and fun!  Julia waxes my eyebrows and always does a phenomenal job!  I would highly recommend this salon!

name: Rebecca Dempsey
text: My stylist is great! She's been doing my hair for five years. Everyone is pleasant. Great service!

name: Brent Panell
text:
Best Salon in Birmingham!!

Friendly staff with mad skills combined with great prices!! Stop searching for a stylist and just book with Capelli!

Get ready for compliments on your hair!!!!

name: Barbara Britton
text: Couldn't have had a better experience very nice people and Kelly was fantastic

name: Katie Prodoehl
text: Everyone here is great.  I have been seeing Christina for years & she is amazing with my color. Love the cookies & drinks, too!

name: Amy Albers
text: My experience with my stylist was very good, although I did feel a chill in the air between some of the stylists. It was offputting, but overall a good experience.

name: Brandy Suns
text: Julia did a wonderful job on my spray tan and eyebrows! It was a great experience.

name: Tammy Love
text: The staff is amazing and I absolutely love having my hair done there!

name: JW Berry
text: My stylist Julia did a great job of discussing options and cutting my hair.  Will definitely visit again.

name: BooksbyJacobRay
text: Flakes on Cancer Organizations in the name of profits! We had two events with Capelli both were for a rare neuroendocrine cancer. Our staff was told to ‘lower our prices’ so that Capelli could make more money & skip helping our cause. The staff there are racist, uneducated, shallow & care nothing about the community- just money! Go anywhere else! Their prices are as big of a joke as their politricks. Imagine flaking on a cancer organization- patients eager to see pictures, eager to read posts, but denied over Capelli’s interest in money.

name: Laura Gillespie
text: Very friendly, quiet and professional!

name: Katie Cooley Lock
text: These ladies rock!! Great salon and environment!

text: Awesome!

text: Kelly was great 👍

text: Katherine is the best!

name: Kris Findlay
text: Nice place!

name: Holly Tourney

name: Barnacle Bill
text: Among all the other locations this one is the least desirable. The Pelham location offers so much more in a more updated facility. Don’t waste your time here. 👎👎

resp.text: Hi Bill! Glad you are enjoying the Pelham location.  Members get to enjoy multi-club access. While Hoover may not have the glitz and glam of our newer locations, it is special to 24e. Hoover was our very first location and has an "Old School" vibe and equipment you would be hard pressed to find anywhere else. So show us some love and consider giving us 5 stars. Thanks and Happy New Year!!

name: LaDarren Smith
text: BYSWO Fitness Trains out of this funk and it is the absolute best for those looking to take their fitness to another level! byswofitness.com can help with personal training and nutrition coaching

text: One of the best gyms in Birmingham with multiple locations

resp.text: Thanks Christopher!! So great to hear you are enjoying 24e. It's an honor to serve our awesome members!

name: WADE COLEMAN
text: Awesome gym, awesome environment. Great variety of equipment too.

name: Philip Duchock
text: Decent gym, a little small but conviemient for those who work odd hours. Customer service is good but im not a fan of the contract would recommend for locals near by.

name: Devin M Chapman
text: Clean, neutral environment. Great place to get some work in and be your self.

name: JaCorey Murray
text: I've been with this gym since 2012 and no complaints. Love the free weights, space and ability to come at any time of the day. If you're looking for a personal trainer, I'll recommend Nicolette Hayes. She is very talented and has a wide range of options to help with general cardio and strength conditioning. She'll also take the time to understand and customize your workout.

resp.text: Hi JaCorey! Thanks for taking the time to leave a great review. We are so thankful to have you at 24e for all these years. It is an honor. Thank you!!!

name: Jason Harmon
text:
Knowledgeable management and friendly.
Most adequate facilities for facilitating better health. Highly recommend

name: Carlos Cumpiano
text: This is a great gym. The staff is great. Very friendly people and like to make sure they have relationships with their members. It’s a little more than PF black card but well worth the price. Everyone that goes wants to work and better themselves.

name: Sabrina Gaddy
text: Luv 24e! It's a modern 'old school' style gym. Fantastic equipment & lots of it! Also lot of free weights! Open 24 hrs which is so awesome for those of us who work weird hours. Staff is great! always cheerful &  happy to assist!  Luv this gym!!

resp.text: Thank you, Sabrina!

name: Tommie Wisaeu
text: Honestly, this gym is EASILY the BEST gym I've been to. Nothing else comes close. Well, maybe a gym that costs 3x as much will be as good, but why bother when this gym is clean, has all of the equipment you could possibly need, and staff that genuinely cares. Price is fair, all the equipment works, plenty of changing rooms and bathrooms, private showers, this gym is as good as it gets.

resp.text: Thanks for the awesome review, Trent!! So thankful to have you at 24e!!

name: Bergen Bolt
text:
The best gym in town!
I've used several different local gyms over the years, and this one is far and away my favorite. The equipment is fantastic, the facility is large and open, the staff is knowledgeable, helpful, and friendly, and the other members are amazing. As a woman on a weight loss journey, it can be difficult to find a gym where it feels like I belong. And it's really cool to feel like I belong in a gym where bodybuilding athletes train!
The price is perfect and the service and support from staff is above and beyond! I recently had surgery and they called to check on me to make sure I was healing okay. I love this gym!!!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for those kind words!! It is truly a blessing to have such awesome members!! Thanks Bergen!!

name: Garrett Bell
text: This gym is great for anyone. The environment is very nice, with a good mix of beginners up to series bodybuilders. Mix of older and newer equipment which is very well maintained. Staff is friendly and helpful. I have and would recommend this gym to anyone. Gym gets fairly busy later in the day from 4-6pm but never to busy to get on the machines and weights you want to use. The best part is you can workout any time any day. For the most part there is always a few people working out.

name: Deep South
text: Best gym I have ever been a member of, common sense owner and staff.

name: Steve Trowbridge
text: Great Gym! Never packed, very clean, employees are great!

resp.text: Thanks Steve!! That is great to hear! We are thankful have such awesome members and staff!

name: David Rhodes
text: Team Swole, Whooo!

resp.text: Ha! That's right! Thanks for the five stars!!

name: Steven Johnson
text: I have been going to this gym since it opened. I love it because they have a lot of free weights and many different types. They even have lifting platforms with bumper style plates for Olympic and power lifting. I wouldn't go anywhere else. The owner and staff are top notch as well

name: Koinonia with God
text:
What makes 24e so special is my personal trainer, Hugheston. He is one of the most soft-hearted and intentional people I have ever met. Your goals become his goals and he somehow always manages to go the extra mile with you. I have spent my whole life away from the gym but he has transformed my negative perception of working out into a world of excitement and possibility. I never thought I could enjoy working out!

I'm always suspicious about trainers but he is not in it for the money, his motivation is in getting to transform your lives and I have gotten to see that first hand.

resp.text: Thank you, so much! We are certainly proud of Hugheston and are thankful for awesome members like you!!

name: Jim McFerrin
text: Best equipment and staff in town.

resp.text: Not to mention, the best members!! Thank you!

name: Bryan Gilbert
text: Best customer experience I’ve ever had at a business. Houston at the front desk was one of the friendliest people I’ve ever met. Give that man a raise.

name: B D
text: Best bang for buck ive ever gotten from a gym. Always open and it's good for people who really want to work out. Even though it's more of a bodybuilder gym, the crowd has always been really welcoming to whoever

text: I like this gym. Owner is cool. Employees are cool. Membership price is not bad.  Hammer strength equipment is good.

name: Craig Summerville
text: Why would you go anywhere else?  Definitely the best "bang for the buck", so to speak.  There are no other gyms in the area where you can spend $25.00 a month and have access to a gym 24 hours a day!  This makes it super convenient if you work odd hours.  The atmosphere is fantastic.  The equipment is modern, clean, and well maintained.  The staff is extremely friendly and knowledgeable.  So, I ask again, why would you go elsewhere?

name: Shaun Southward
text: Best gym in Birmingham. Only gym in town that gives you access to a full gym, that's 24/7 with no contract memberships. Staff was great, not stuffy like most places. $25 per month for this place is a steal

resp.text: Thanks Marc!!

text: I have some friends that work out here. its not for the faint of heart. if you are serious about getting fit and making it a lifestyle this may be the perfect gym for you.

name: Charlie Prince
text: Best gym I've ever been to. Clean, had whether you need the people and ut has a great culture of your serious about getting in shape.

name: J Spratling
text: I experienced the same poor service when I tried to cancel my membership.  Jack, the manager, was extremely unprofessional.  I would NOT recommend this gym to anyone.  There are several gyms in the Birmingham area.  You can easily find one that appreciates your business from the time you sign up to the time you cancel.  Do not go to this gym.

text: 24e fitness in Hoover is awesome, and the atmosphere is great. Hugheston is my personal trainer and I highly recommend him. We have great interaction, while he gives me valuable coaching techniques. Hugheston has also helped me with a great diet plan to help me achieve my goals. Thanks Hugheston!!

resp.text: Thank you, Brent! It is truly rewarding to have such awesome members and to hear that our trainers, like Hugheston, are making a difference!!

name: Grant Price

resp.text: Thanks Grant! We're so happy to hear that Hugheston is helping you meet your fitness goals!

name: frank baker
text: This is a beautiful facility convenient to research park.  It's nice to have a place to work out at lunch break.

name: Jay R
text: This is a clean, well run, locally owned business. 24e offers just about every service you'd want from a Health Club membership.

name: Jay R
text: This is a clean, well run, locally owned business. 24e offers just about every service you'd want from a Health Club membership.

name: Nannette Zeanah
text: I have used this gym for 5 years.  My family uses it as well.  I have lost 105 pounds.  Wow!  That's amazing isn't it!.  My son has lost over 100 pounds as well.  I couldn't have done it without the help of the staff and trainers.  I train with Hugheston at present.  He's amazing and very knowledgeable.  He is very conscientious and seems to care about his clients.  He helps me to do the exercises with the correct form. I am older and have some physical issues.  He works with me to help improve my mobility and flexibility.  That really helps me alot.  I am a nurse and work 12 hours shifts three days a week.  Hugheston helps me immensely.  I could keep going on and on but I want everyone to know that the Hoover 24e is a great place to get healthy and fit.  I've never been uncomfortable or felt out of place.  If I have questions Daniel or Hugheston makes sure to help me find the answers.  So if you want to get fit or just be healthy come see what the gym is all about.

name: Chris Ehrixh
text: Great gym. Love it.

resp.text: Thanks Chris!

name: Cameron White
text: Great staff, great regulars, and most importantly great gym.

name: Jeff Randle
text: This fitness club is HUGE with so many options for literally anything you could want to do. The cardio equipment is all the way on the other side of the gym from the free weights so the people who don't want to mingle don't have to. If machines are your thing, they have any and all that you can imagine. They've really tried to cover every base with this gym.

text: No Cooling Off Period or Try It Out Time. I joined this gym and after going five times did not feel like it was the right fit for me, and did not like going to a gym without staff at night. When I contacted Daniel at the gym and asked if I could cancel I was told my only options were to pay a $150 or finish out the contact without using the gym if I did not like it. He said it did not matter that I had only been a member for less than a two weeks. So beware they do not offer a trial period - join and if you do not like it pay their fee.
