resp.text: Hey Madison! Thank you for the awesome review! We're thrilled to hear that our team is taking great care of you! Can't wait to see you back in the salon again soon! - Your Friends at Palm Beach Tan

name: Mark Hall
text:
Very Frustrated...My wife and I have payed over $100.00 a month for a membership  for over two years. Due to our busy life styles, we join Palm Beach Tan specifically for the spray feature which typically alloys us to get in and out quickly.  In the last few months we have had terrible experiences with the lack of maintaining  there equipment with this location and the Auburn location.  Many times over I have undressed and stepped into the booth for a spray and with very much disappointment the only spray I`m receiving is air only.   No tanning solution!! Or we come in for a spray and the booth is not working at all. This has happened to my wife and I multiple times recently. Very frustrating to have to get dressed and go make someone aware at the front desk and then go and get undressed for the second time.
My opinion is. ..If the staff would spend more time preparing the machines for there next guest, these issues shouldn`t happen.  These unpleasant experiences are causing my wife and I to rethink whether or not we should continue with our membership and this may not matter.  This is not good for your loyal paying members.

resp.text: Mark, thank you for bringing this to our attention. We're so sorry to hear that you were disappointed in our salon and we'd like to speak with you to discuss your experience. If you're willing, please email pbtfeedback@tanningmail.com with your full name, phone number and a link to this review. Once received, we'll have someone reach out to you ASAP. Thank you. -Your Friends at Palm Beach Tan

resp.text: Kerri, thank you for bringing this to our attention. We are so sorry to hear that you were disappointed in our salon and we'd like to speak with you to discuss your experience. text: My experience with this tanning salon was AMAZING!!! Brandi, the manager made sure I had EVERYTHING I needed for the perfect spray tan along with her staff. I had never done spray tanning, nor been in a tanning salon before & it was amazing. I recommend this place to anyone looking for a great tan & wonderful service!!!

resp.text: Hi Aliyah! Thank you so much for this amazing review! We are so happy to hear that you had such an amazing experience at our salon! We can't wait to see you again soon! -Your Friends at Palm Beach Tan

resp.text: Hi Darlene! Thank you so much for your great review! It made our day to hear that you are enjoying your visits to our salon! Looking forward to seeing you again! -Your Friends at Palm Beach Tan

name: Kristy Smith
text:
I'm disappointed in the spray tan. I went to the phenix  city location this past Saturday night...used the mystic bed...the door is broke, and wouldn't close, so she shouldn't of even let me use it....my legs got super dark, but waist up looks like it barely got anything at all...literally....they had NO sticky feet, but my feet actually came out ok, which is weird, but I'm grateful for that of course, except the fact that they are alot white than my legs, like it didn't spray good at all....my face...oh lawd...I barely felt it spray my face and I got no color to it at all....
Then the girl told me "oh you're lucky, tonight spray's are only $20" but my bill ended up being $40....??? So an accelerator and bronzer are $10 each??? Wow
I have sprayed here a few times, and never had a problem, but this time was horrible and has me not ever wanting to go back...I'm so disappointed....and I know that spray tans fade...but it's not suppose to like it is this time...every shower I can literally see it washing away off my legs...they are to the point to where they are almost spotty already...
I can't suggest to never go there cause I know palm beach has a great name and usually has pretty decent service but this was the worse experience I've ever had with any spray tan. Ever.

resp.text: Kristy, thank you for bringing this to our attention. We're so sorry to hear that you were disappointed in our salon and we'd like to speak with you to discuss your experience. If you're willing, please send us an email with your full name, phone number and a link to this review to pbtfeedback@tanningmail.com. Once received, we'll have someone reach out to you ASAP. Thank you. -Your Friends at Palm Beach Tan

resp.text: Hey Suzanne! Thank you so much for leaving us this wonderful review! It makes our day to hear that our team is taking such great care of you! Hope to see you again soon! -Your Friends at Palm Beach Tan

resp.text: Hi Bonnie! Thank you for the awesome review! We're so happy to hear that our team is taking great care of you! Hope to see you back again soon! - Your Friends at Palm Beach Tan

name: Sonya Owens
text:
The staff needs more training. I’ve been given inconsistent information from the PC, Alabama location.
All they seem to be worried about is upselling their products.  Today....the issue was that I left my goggles in my other purse. I have NEVER been asked to show them my goggles before tanning, but of course the one day that I forgot my goggles I was asked to show them. I was offered to purchase another pair.... umm no! I’m a grown woman and if I choose to not wear goggles that should be my choices! I would be glad to sign a disclaimer acknowledging that I understand the risks of not wearing goggles.  The other policy regarding not being able to tan within 24 hours is also an inconvenience, while I get the reasoning....it’s a huge inconvenience!

resp.text: Sonya, we're so sorry to hear that you were disappointed in our salon and we'd like to speak with you to discuss your experience. If you're willing, please email pbtfeedback@tanningmail.com with your full name, phone number and a link to this review. Once received, we'll have someone reach out to you ASAP. Thank you. -Your Friends at Palm Beach Tan

text: You have the best beds in town & the staff r wonderful help at finding wat works best for u & they keep it so clean ...i love tanning there & I tell all my friends

resp.text: Hey Paula! Thank you so much for your kind words and your awesome review! We appreciate your feedback, and we're thrilled to hear our team is taking great care of you when you visit our salon. Can't wait to see you again soon! -Your Friends at Palm Beach Tan

resp.text: Hey Candice! Thank you so much for leaving us an awesome 5-star review! It makes our day to hear from our happy customers! Hope to see you again soon! -Your Friends at Palm Beach Tan

name: Lisa Smith
text: My first time spray tanning... Staff was helpful with the process... Just a little confusion on the packages and what is included in each.   I would reccommend to friends!

resp.text:
Hi Lisa!
We are so glad that you had such a great first spray tan experience with us at our salon and that our staff was so helpful throughout the process. If you have any questions regarding our packages and what each package includes, please do not hesitate to email us at pbtfeedback@tanningmail.com and include the best way to contact you. Otherwise, you can learn more about our packages at https://palmbeachtan.com/locations/AL/Phenix-City-Summerville-Road/. We look forward to hearing from you, and we hope we'll get to see you again soon! - Your Friends at Palm Beach Tan

resp.text: Hey there! Thank you so much for leaving us this wonderful review! We are so thrilled to hear your kind words about our salon! Can’t wait to see you again! -Your Friends at Palm Beach Tan

name: Brooke Black
text: Great customer service! Most already know my name when I walk in. Whitney is awesome and she always tells me the best products to use. The beds are always clean and the perks you get for being a loyal customer are great. The $1 upgrades and specials on spray tans is a wonderful idea. I recommend Palm Beach Tan to all of my friends.

resp.text: Hi Brooke! Thank you for writing us this wonderful review! We are so happy to hear that our team is taking such great care of you and your tan! Can't wait to see you again! -Your Friends at Palm Beach Tan

name: Maxwell Drake
text: Good people

name: Anna Walden
text: Best tanning salon I've ever been to. Summer is the employee I spoke with. She was great, very informative and peppy. Great attitude and was honest with me about all the beds and how they work. Love the stand up bed and the other one I used. Prices seem reasonable for these beds

resp.text: Hey Anna! Thank you so much for the incredible review! We are thrilled to hear that you are loving your time with us and that our team is providing you with such amazing customer service! We can't wait to see you in the salon again soon! -Your Friends at Palm Beach Tan

name: Christy Sterling
text: I joined after belonging to another tanning salon which I loved. I changed due to cheaper unlimited price. I normally tan around 8-9am every morning.  Yaw don't open till 12 on Sunday, which is great that your employees may attend church,  but if I tan on Sunday I won't be able to tan at my usual time from now on which is ridiculous.  Maybe don't have the 24 hr between Sunday n Monday.  It seems as if that's just a way for you to limit the unlimited to 6 days/week instead of 7, which is what we are paying for.  What can be done about this. I am very unhappy & disallusioned with palm beach presently & will not recommend to anyone unless this is resolved. Please contact me asap via phone preferably or email as  last resort.  Thank you so much.  The workers are great & very helpful but this needs to be resolved asap! I seriously don't imagine I'm the only one with this issue. I have no problem with the 24 hr period except between Sunday & Monday

resp.text: Hi Christy- We appreciate you taking the time to reach out to us about this and provide us with feedback. We understand your frustration and would be happy to get in touch with you about this. If you're interested in speaking to us further, please send please send us an email with your contact information and a link to this review to pbtfeedback@tanningmail.com and we will contact you. Have a wonderful week! -Your Friends at Palm Beach Tan

name: Amy Fortson
text: The girls always greet me with a smile. It’s always clean and neat and a very comfortable environment. Their beds are the BEST in town !  I always enjoy my visits to PBT !!!

resp.text: Hey Amy! Thank you for taking the time to leave us this awesome review! We are so thrilled to hear that you are enjoying tanning with us! Looking forward to your next visit! -Your Friends at Palm Beach Tan

name: Erica Hawkins
text: I had heard that Palm Beach Tan offered really good spray tans, so I decided to try one. I’m going to the beach in a few weeks and I didn’t want to risk going looking like an Oompha Loompha. I’ve had 2 bad spray tans in the past. That was not the case. I woke up the next day and I was so happy to look like I’d been tanning all summer long. The employee was very sweet and explained everything in full detail. I’m very pale and freckled, but I went ahead with a medium tan with a bronzer. I was so nervous but the sweet employee calmed my nerves. I’ve been back since and purchased a monthly package. No more baking my skin in the sun. I’ll be a sporting a fake spray tan from now on.

resp.text: Hi Erica! Thank you for the awesome review! We're thrilled to hear that you're loving your tan! See you back in the salon again soon! - Your Friends at Palm Beach Tan

name: Lydia Stark
text: Love the beds. It is more expensive than most place and you can only tan once in a 24 hour period, so if you go today at 3 pm you cannot go tomorrow until the full 24 hours have passed. It's inconvenient when you get off work at the same time everyday and have to keep moving your time to 15 minutes later than the day before.  They said it's a new fda regulation so it may be the same everywhere, I'm not sure

resp.text:
Hi Lydia!
Thank you so much for taking the time to review our salon! We so appreciate your feedback! In regards to our 24-Hour Policy, we have implemented this in all of our salons nation wide to help protect your skin and maximize your tanning results! For more information check out our website: http://palmbeachtan.com/24hourpolicy/. Have an awesome day! :)
-Your Friends at Palm Beach Tan

text: I was extremely impressed with the color and the quality of the spray. When I got my spray tan at Brush of Bronze it was even and it looked natural. Another thing I thought was cool is it smelled really good. Since you can't shower for a while I think that's important. I also have sensitive skin.. I can't use a certain soaps and lotions so I was excited that it didn't breakout my skin. :) 5/5 for sure

name: dustin dailey
text:
To be a gym that is against Lunks and even has a Lunk alarm saying.  That they would have a Lunk as manager of this location.
Great facility with great new equipment. However the manager is rude and has an attitude problem.   I canceled my membership over a pair of 4 dollar tanning bed goggles.   It’s not the goggles that made me cancel.  it was the attitude of the manager.  He didn’t oppose me canceling my membership in no way.  Canceling was very simple and easy!  Very pleased!  I recommend this location if you’d like to cancel your membership.

resp.text: Hi, dustin. We understand that our club isn't for everyone, but we still appreciate your feedback. Please try to understand that we don't actually like to use the lunk alarm, but we will use it if it means protecting our #JudgementFreeZone. Pushing the body and achieving results is completely acceptable, but excessive yelling and weight slamming are not. Thanks for reaching out.

name: ray royster
text: Can’t get anyone to answer the phone. I have read other reviews with same problem and they were told they should have gotten an appointment. How are you suppose to do that when no one will talk to you. Don’t think you care

resp.text: Hi Ray.  Thanks for the review.  I answered your message in less than an hour however it hasn't been read.  Again, thanks for the review!

text: Excellent selection of equipment they had everything u need! Nice clean environment.

resp.text: Thank you Russell!  We hope to see you again soon!

name: Lee Berrey
text: This is a good old school gym,  no aerobics or yoga classes...good selection of free weights and machines!

resp.text: Thank you Lee!  We sure do love our downtown home!

name: Bruce Hebert
text: I love this place. Every time I come to town to visit I will go to Creed to get a workout in. Nice friendly staff, great equipment and nice atmosphere. I would definitely be a member if I lived closer

name: Krissy Stephens
text: I went to try the gym out. The door was locked and no one there to help at 12:30 in the evening. A member let me in and I could had just worked out but I wanted to do the right thing and purchase a day pass or sign up for a trial. But when the member found someone to help me the employee turned my business away because I didn’t have cash and I had to leave the gym. Won’t go back

resp.text: Hello Krissy.  I'm sorry you seemed to have a bad experience.  We are a small family owned gym.  Even though we are a 24 hour facility for our members we strongly suggest that you have an appointment before coming to the gym for new membership, tour or day pass.  For this reason I cannot say who you spoke with or what information they gave you.  I can assure you it was not an employee.  I hope you find a facility to suit your needs.  Thanks for the review!
